description: Website Content Management System (CMS) Semina Dashboard. There are Authentication, Authorization, refresh token, CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) features, and has 3 roles.
This website includes Fullstack Javascript using ReactJs, ExpressJs, MongoDb, and NodeJs. This project was created during Bootcamp at BWA (Build With Angga).
Seminar Landing Page Website, there is login and registration. sending OTP via email, and there is a Semina checkout feature available on the Semina CMS website. BackEnd Integration with ExpressJs.
The travel website was created using ReactJs, and takes data from the staycation backend server created with ExpressJS.

On this website, we can order a room according to what we want, we can order within a few days, and finally there is a total that must be paid. Then at the final stage there is uploading proof of transfer.
This website has login and register features, then features to add friends, delete friends, update posts, and like posts.
This project is Fullstack, because this is a MERN project. This social media app website was created with React Js, Express Js, MongoDb, and NodeJs.
This website takes data directly from the Valorant API, showcasing several Features. Such as character list, character details, abilities of each character, weapon list, and weapon details.
This website was created with NextJs, and styling using TailwindCss. The purpose of creating this website is to learn to consume APIs using NextJS.
